opinion.posture: Criminal proceedings. Drug offense. Before LEWIS, J. Nos. 623 and 624 Apr. T., 1978. Appeals from the judgmentsPage 633 of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas, Criminal Division, of Allegheny County, Nos. CC7704534 and CC7704533. Submitted April 12, 1979.
opinion.attorneys: David O'Hanesian, for appellants; Robert L. Eberhardt, Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before CERCONE, P.J., and WIEAND and HOFFMAN, JJ.
